response.original_title: Speak The Music: Robert Mann And The Mysteries Of Chamber Music
response.overview: Robert Mann has been a vital force in the world of music for more than seventy years. As founder and first violinist of the Julliard String Quartet, and as a soloist, composer, teacher, and conductor, Mann has brought a refreshing sense of adventure and discovery to chamber music performance, master classes, and orchestral performances worldwide. In Speak the Music, the 93-year-old Mann shares personal anecdotes from his childhood and musical training. Director Allan Miller combines archival performance footage, candid interviews, and glimpses into Mann's private lessons with today's most promising violinists to honor one of classical music's greatest living artists. (C) First Run
response.tagline: Robert Mann and the Mysteries of Chamber Music
response.title: Speak The Music: Robert Mann And The Mysteries Of Chamber Music
